name: smarm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to be extremely polite or helpful or show a lot of respect in a way that is annoying or does not seem sincere: He's always trying to smarm his way into a promotion. "It's no use trying to smarm me," she laughed. See
smarmy
More examplesFewer examplesThey are always trying to smarm up to the teacher.She can smarm her way out of a difficult situation."Don't smarm, you smug little thing," he shouted.
